strategy: Adepta Sororitas armies have a Strategy Rating of 3.
Initiative: Ordo Hereticus formations including the Inquisitor Retinue, and Imperial Navy formations, have an Initiative Rating of 2+. All other formations have an Initiative of 1+.

formations.name: Mission
extraUnits: Replace two units of Battle Sisters with two Exorcist Prioris: 50 points

formations.name: 0-1 Ordo Hereticus Inquisitor Retinue
formations.units: One Ordo Hereticus Inquisitor, five Storm Troopers, three Chimeras
extraUnits: Replace three Chimeras with three Valkyries: 50 points

sections.name: Adepta Sororita Support Formations
sections.description: Two Adepta Sororitas Support Formations may be taken per Adepta Sororitas Core Formation

formations.name: Immolation
formations.units: One Palatine, three Celestian Sisters, three Sororitas Immolators

formations.name: Exorcism
extraUnits: Replace four Exorcist Prioris with four Exorcist Sanctorum: 25 points

formations.name: Retribution
formations.units: One Palatine, four Retributor Sisters, two Sororitas Rhinos
extraUnits: Replace two Sororitas Rhinos with two Sororitas Repressors: 20 points

formations.name: Dominus
formations.units: One Palatine, four Dominion Sisters, two Sororitas Rhinos
extraUnits: Replace two Sororitas Rhinos with two Sororitas Repressors: 20 points

sections.name: Ordo Hereticus Formations
sections.description: One Ordo Hereticus Formation may be taken per Adepta Sororitas Core Formation

formations.name: Redemption
formations.units: One Ministorum Priest, eight Redemptionists, four Ordo Hereticus Land Transporters
extraUnits: Replace four Ordo Hereticus Land Transporters and four Redemptionists with six Arco-Flagellants, or four Penitent Engines: 50 points

sections.name: Imperial Navy Formations
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on Imperial Navy formations

formations.name: 0â€“1 Orbital Support
extraUnits: Replace the Lunar Class Cruiser with an Emperor Class Battleship: 50 points

upgrades.title: Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

options.description: Replace a Palatine with a Cannoness (Mission only)
Replace the Ordo Hereticus Inquisitor with an Ordo Hereticus Inquisitor Lord (Ordo Hereticus Inquisitor Retinue only)

items.name: Living Saint (0-1 per army)
items.description: Replace a Palatine and its unit with a Living Saint

items.name: Transport
items.description: You must take exactly enough to carry all units in the formation after any upgrades have been added. No transport spaces may be left over if possible

options.description: Add any number of Sororitas Immolators
Add any number of Sororitas Repressors
Add any number of Sororitas Rhinos
